PATIENT_ID: TEST_HANG_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-22 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-22 18:10:00
Category I activation for 19-year-old female found unresponsive in closet.
Ligature mark on neck consistent with hanging mechanism.
Near-hanging confirmed. Strangulation by cord.
BP 90/50, HR 130, RR 8, SpO2 78%, GCS 3.
Intubated in field by EMS. Airway secured.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-22 18:15:00
Petechiae present above neck. Ligature mark circumferential.
No imaging has been obtained yet. Patient hemodynamically unstable.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-22 18:45:00
Patient remains critical. Resuscitation ongoing.
No CT imaging obtained due to hemodynamic instability.
No assessment for anoxic brain injury documented.
